title: Naan Romba Romba lyrics Siruthai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer : Ranjith, Chorus
Song : Naan Romba Romba
Lyrics : Na Muthukumar

Jintha-tha jintha jintha jintha tha tha
Jintha-tha jintha jintha jintha tha tha

Naan Romba Romba Nalla pilla illa
Romba nalla pilla-kellam nan chella pilla illa
Naan Romba Romba Nalla pilla illa
Romba nalla pilla-kellam nan chella pilla illa

friend-ellam poriki pulla
echikala thirutu pulla
engaluku oorum illa
permananent-u perum illa
thatiketka aalum illa
dav-vadika neram illa
sondham endru yaarum illa
sentiment-u yedhum illa

Raja Raja nan Rock Raja
ye raja raja rocket raja

Naan Romba Romba Nalla pilla illa
Romba nalla pilla-kellam nan chella pilla illa

5-am class-u padikum podhu, aataya potavan
6-am class-u padikum podhu blade potavan
head master bike-a thirudi edaiku potavan
nan central jail-il 100 thadava tent-tu potavan

emaandha emaathu, envela vammaathu
solvadhellam suthamaana poi
vakkiradhelam pocket-tula kai
paraangallil kooda eduthiduven nan neyi neyi

Raja Raja nan Rock Raja
ye raja raja rocket raja

Naan Romba Romba Nalla pilla illa
Romba nalla pilla-kellam nan chella pilla illa

Kambi enni kambi enni kanaku padichavan
Nan 4 vayasil nambiyaara pola suttavan
Vanji kota vaaliban-ah vazha nenchavan
nan pinjulaye palluthavan-nu peru eduthavan

En rootu thani rootu, En bettu adhu vettu
solvadhellam suthamaana poi
vakkiradhelam pocket-tula kai
paraangallil kooda eduthiduven nan neyi neyi

Raja Raja ne Rock Raja
ye raja raja rocket raja

Naan Romba Romba Nalla pilla illa
Romba nalla pilla-kellam nan chella pilla illa
Naan Romba Romba Nalla pilla illa
Romba nalla pilla-kellam nan chella pilla illa

engaluku oorum illa
permananent-u perum illa
thatiketka aalum illa
dav-vadika neram illa
sondham endru yaarum illa
sentiment-u yedhum illa

ne Rock Raja --adra maamu
ye raja raja --yeah
